name: Ping Break
description:
A game of PONG with colorful additions.

How to play
  • Keyboard
    • W and S for the left pad
    • UP and DOWN arrows for the right pad.
  • Mobile (the screen is "divided" in four equal parts)
    • Upper- and lower-left parts control the left pad
    • Upper- and lower-right parts control the right pad.

Bonuses appear in the arena and collecting them activates their effects (explanations on the HELP screen).

In Normal mode, only one effect is active at a time, and there is a noticeable delay between their apparition. In Crazy mode, the delay is shorter and the ball gets no rest between effects.

Credits

BGM: srstrnc - PrettyLobster, on OpenGameArt

Hope you enjoy!
